concept.title: What is a Sum?
concept.shortdesc: Here we learn what is Sum Up tow numbers

conbody.p: The sum is the result of adding two or more numbers together. For example, if you add 3 and 5, the sum is 8.

section.title: Usage of Sum:

ul.li: Basic Arithmetic: It's fundamental in everyday math, helping with tasks like counting, budgeting, and making purchases.
Data Analysis: Summing values in data sets helps calculate totals, averages, and other important metrics.
Programming: Used in loops and algorithms to accumulate values.
Finance: Helps in calculating total expenses, income, and profits.

section.p: The concept of sum is one of the building blocks of mathematics and is widely used in various fields and daily life.
